text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea maxima (also called Yellow Meranti) is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia.
text.References: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea maxima". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31436A9634594. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31436A9634594.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
